topic: Should countries with traditional views on gender be legally required to provide equal rights and protections to individuals who identify outside the male-female binary?

initial_response.Confucian:

While the idea of providing equal rights to all individuals, regardless of their gender identity, may seem progressive and inclusive, it is crucial to consider how such measures align with the traditional values that have long been the foundation of our society.
